column2: Though we have not yet reformed our ancient empire, Constantinople is still ours and naturally sits on the best position possible to govern Greece and Asia Minor.
Modernize Agriculture in the Fertile Crescent

The time has come. The senate and more importantly, the people, have spoken their wishes to unite the peninsula. Italia shall be one, undivided and prosperous once again. But these rump states in south still cling on to their status quo and will not budge to unite any time soon. It is time to show them war. Sicilia delanda est!
The question of the holy see

The papacy has for long ruled over rome, ever since the year 759 AD. The heart of catholicism, this place holds tremendous value to the people of our nation and of many more. Thus, with the blessing of Pope Pius IX, the papal states shall now be subservient to Genoa. This will be our first step to restoring an old fantasy.
The Legend of Romulus and Remus @RMR

Romulus and Remus were abandonned at birth, left as orphans in the wilderness of the forest on the river Tiber. Romolus and Remus grew up nurtured by a she-wolf until adopted by shepherd as his sons. Faustulus was his name and alonside his wife they raised them into adulthood. The brothers then sought to found a city, but they disputed over it's location. This tension boiled over when Remus and his followers attacked Romolus, but the gods had chosen Romolus that day and Remus was killed. In the aftermath of this fratricide, Rome was to be founded in the XVIIIth century BC by Romolus. This story is now true once again, as we have vanquished our brothers in italia, we now will found not the city of Rome, but the state of Rome. Roma Eterna!

Rome must continue it's integration of italians into latin culture. The province of savoie has for long been occupied by the french speaking lower burgundians. This has now changed and they will once again call themselves roman.
It is time to weigh in on Greek affairs
We have pressed our claim over Graecia, it is now time to integrate greek culture into roman society.
After multiple decades of living side-by-side with greeks and conquering their homeland, It is now time to directly administrate the greek lands.

Our King has spoken, we have asserted our hold over southern italy and the papacy, now lays the Genoan Republic north to be vanquished in battle. Their decadent and pretentious state will be abolished and Italy shall be one.
Our people have now grown to be somewhat accustomed to speaking latin and using latin, but it is still in a transitory period of usage.
We are finally done with our transition into a classical latin society, we shall now enjoy a level of cultural unity in Italia that has never been seen before.
The Papacy has been under our subjugation for some time now, it is time that we integrate directly into our kingdom.
The Pheonix rose and an Eagle fell.
Rome was recently proclaimed in direct opposition to our Byzantine Empire, but the pretenders are no more, we control part of their lands and their people.
After our establishment as the sole and unique Rome, we must push north in the Italian peninsula and capture the remainder of the Roman territories.
Fire all minority bureaucrats and demote them to farmers and labourers, however this may affect our administrative effiency short-term.
Our isles are very interlinked with the Channel, this leads us to question whether or not we should establish Mare Britannicum as being under our firm control.
The Kurdish people are close brothers to the Persian people, we must consider them part of our society.

Our Empire had long held control over the Dalmatian coast, the Adriatic and its people. It is time to now establish our rule over the entirety of the Balkans and integrate their people in our society.
Our people have long been disunited and trampled upon by Mongol Horsemen and Polish Nobles. No longer will the Slavic peoples stand alone, together we will form our own destiny. Slava!
With our influence over the Ukrainian lands unconteste we can proclaim the Ukrainian people as a part of our cultural hegemony over most of Eastern Europe.

The province of Africa, also refered to as Africa Proconsularis, was one of the central parts of the Roman Republic until the overtaking of the Ptolemaic Egypt in the year 30 B.C. This has led to us seeking out this province once again for a larger grain supply to feed our populus as we reimplement the grain dole not only in Rome but all across the country
The untamed plains of Pelsov remain open for territorial expansion, we must lay claim to it under the name of our God and country

The Pruthenians and the Wends have a long kinship with the Polish people, tracing back our origins to the same tribes and all 3 being catholics. It is now time to fully integrate them into our bureaucracy and state.
With the death of Duke Friedrich Kmiecik so goes the autonomy of the Silesian Duchy. As written in his will, the lands of the House of Kmiecik will be inherited to King Stanislaus of Jagiellon.
Uneasy Unification of the Jagiellon holdings @PLC
The Jagiellon holdings have for too long been disunited by old Personal Unions, this cannot last if we are to recover from the blow delt by the Bohemians.

Our King Stanislaus has been greatly influenced by the exploits of Kazimierz, the former Hetman Cossacks. This has sparked a fire within Stanislaus to cultivate a cultural bond between the Ruthenian people and the Poles. The move has garnered quite the attention from the Polish nobility which feel like he is neglecting his duties as the Polish king and instead focusing on some fantasy spurred on by a decrepit Kazimierz.
As we have conquered the West bank of the Dniper, we must push further and conquer the rest of the Ruthenian lands so that we may truly be considered protectors of the Ruthenians.

Our neighboring Germans have long been disunited by Petty Kingdoms and former princes of the HRE, this has left a power vacuum filled partly by the Hansa and the Dutch, but this influence is very fragile and we ought to get involved in this playground.
The lands of Holstein should be handled by the Pomeranians to facilitate adminstration and grow our client state's power.
With our influence over Hanover total, there is no one left to defend Hanover from our might. We shall seize Hanoverian lands and give it to our subjects in North Germany
Brunswick clearly stands in the way of our Elbian Hegemony, with our influence established over it we shall integrate it into Saxony
Gotha holds strategic importance to the defence of the Elbe and shall be integrated to Saxony
Another peace in the Elbian puzzle, Detmold gives us an important footing on the other side of the Elbe.
It has taken a long time but with our similarities in language, the Czechs are now properly integrated into Jagiellonian society and culture
The Aftermath of the Second War for Bohemia
Wladislaus has finally crushed the Bohemian Crown in war and the people's complaints have been quelled.
After many decades of political struggle for Wladislaus and a second war over Bohemia, we have finally manage to proclaim a unified Jagiellonia!

The Pas-de-Calais has long been appropriated by the Dutch, they have gone to many lengths to try to remove the French influence in the Picard language, but their efforts were not enough. Our deep cultural ties with the Picard are still visible to this day, we will teach the Picards to be part of our culture once again.
Demote All Unaccepted Craftsmen and Clerks
Using this decision will demote all unaccepted craftsmen and clerks on your own cores, to make way for your own accepted pop crafts..

We have for long vyed to have dominion over Albion at the expense of the Irish. After finally pushing them out of Britannia proper, it is time to invade Ierne and finally unify the celts under one flag.

The Scots have long been a rebellious people who have caused us much trouble over the history of the Emerald Island. Ierne has long endured these hardships, but we cannot tolerate this any longer. It is time to push into the heartland of the Scots.

(This path locks you of our Gaullic Destiny) The Scots have been increasing their threats of war for the rest of Britannia and Wales, we must no longer sit by idly stand by and watch as they encroach upon our territory. Britannia cannot remain as the Status Quo is, it must be under our direct rule.

For many centuries we have co-existed with various different tribes. These all have a culture and history that is ancestral to this land and we need to put the status of tribe behind us and unite as one.
No longer will the Greedy Lübeckians harness hefty Tariffs on Baltic and North Sea goods. End the Hanseatic Monopoly on Baltic Trade and open up the straights to free trade!
§R Taking this option will lower immigration for all AI controlled countries in the world, this decision is irreversable.
Antioch has for long been a holy site of the Christian faith and has held religious importance since the early days of the Church.

Ever since our loss in the War for Bohemia, King Wladislaus has never been truly the same, always extremely quiet once Bohemia is mentioned, never able to do any diplomacy with the Bohemians without getting violently angry and proclaiming the lands of Bohemia are ruled under a bastard King. But today is a day of hope, not sadness, as King Wladislaus has accomplished his life-long dream of restoring order in Bohemia.
Bring the Incan lands together and expel the Colonial Invaders!
Form the Bengal Lands into a united country. Together we will be able to hold off the foreign invaders!

Our Conquest of Gaul is complete, The Franks are destroyed. But we cannot relish this moment, for we must move on and teach the lost people of Gaul our true ways and assimilate them back into proper Celts. Aig Last Tha sinn air buannachadh.
The Mandate of Heaven has been restored, let us unite the Chinese people under one Banner!
Romanian peoples have been split up for too long, no longer will we be divided. We stand and fight united!
The Island is united. The Scottish state has prevailed and the Britannic Islands are now ruled from Dun Eideann. Let us celebrate this historic moment!
The Island is united. The Irish state has prevailed and the Britannic Islands are now ruled from Dubh Linn. Let us celebrate this historic moment!
Russia has long been subjugated by foreign Kniaz and plundered by Mongol Raiders. But no more! We have managed to unite Russia and bring death to our enemies!

Constanta, or in more ancient times, Tomis, is in a prime position to be our main port to the Black Sea, by building a bridge over the Danube and encouraging migration to it, we shall surely have a bright future in commerce.
Integrate the Misri peoples into our ranks.
Remove the Salish and seize their Lands for ourselves.
The True Masters of the Coast

Our ways of colonial assimiliation and early outlawing of Slavery gives us the unique opportunity to fraternize the Afro Germans in our colonial holdings. Lets greet our new Germanic brethren with open arms and bring them into the fold.
The Burgundians have evaded central control from Paris long enough. Bring them under our heel and strip them of their lands.
Now that we have secured a Foothold in the North we must press on and secure Central Gaul. The tides are shifting, in OUR favour!
Our Reconquest of Gaul is almost complete. We must not Forsake now and mop up the rest of the Frankish Kingdom, Tha buaidh faisg!

Ethiopia as of now is fairly decentralized, with regional autonomy, due to the rights of our vassals. Revoking these rights would bring us more prosperity, but it would also anger some under the rule of these vassals, including said vassals. Thankfully, our superiour technology, granted to us by the Crusaders in Jerusalem, due to our efforts to help them in their efforts to spread christianity, allows us to unite these lands without much of a hassle.

(This path locks yout of the Gaellia/Britannic Conquest decisions) Our Celtic roots call. We must try and reconquer our Ancestral Homelands from which Caesar has expelled us. The first step is properly establish a foothold on the continent and expell the Franks from the Britannic Coast.
Adding Welsh as a state language and removing their status as second class citizens will turn them into loyal and hard-working Celtic brethren.
All are Welcome In the Horde
reno...reno don't turn the africans into 4 cultures renooo

We have long dominated Baltic Affairs, but it is time to expand our holdings. By conquering the long hostile Hannoverian Lands we will be able to expand our Business into the North Sea, and maybe even further…
The Catalans are an independent peoples, but if brought together with a common goal and a feeling of national fraternity we can integrate them into our ranks.
The Irish have taken over Large parts of our Britannic Coast. We must reverse this course and reconquer our lost Lands in Normandie.

Lorraine is settled mostly by French, these lands have - in their ignorance - seceed from French authority at the first possible moment. Bring them back under our control and integrate them into our Administration.
The South Slavs have existed in our lands for centuries,yet not as long as us, even so, we should allow them some forms of representation to appease them.

Taking this decision will lock you out of the "Unite the Peninsula" decision. You will be able to accept Asturian and get cores on Iberia though if you complete all the Caliphate decisions and form the Caliphate.

(Taking this decision will lock you out of the Caliphate Path of Al Andalus, but will give you more accepted pops in the short term) After many centuries of separation, it has become clear that even with out religious differences, we are not so different, sharing many customs. Even our languages are mostly the same, bar the arabs in the south, both of them stem from Latin and are very closely related. It is thus fitting that we attempt to unite under one, even with innevitable bloodshed.

The Failure of the Emperor in 1834 to defend Crete against the Italian states was catastrophic, humiliating the empire and himself. This lead to the themes of the empire to rise up against him, proclaiming themselves as the new emperors, or in some cases, the populace overthrew their noble leaders and replaced them with republics, which is what these themes would do to the empire. Our strong position allows us to reunite the Empire once again, like a phoenix from the ashes.
Secede Land to Our Alaskan Colony
Move our seat of Government to a new city: Tokyo

Discovered by Dutch explorers, Tasmania is relatively low populated, being one of our most recently acquired colonial holdings. Reforming the administration and attracting immigrants to the colony might help us in the long run, especially since it would be quite likely that the new semi-independent colony would ask for reintegration.
The Circassians have been a thorn in our European side for quite a while, carrying out numerous raids on local establishments and preventing us from properly taxing their local populous.
We will support our Cossacks in colonizing Siberia with grain and cattle. This decision applies to provinces you own in Siberia, the more you have the more valuable it is.

Russian Empire government ministers personally appointed by the Emperor Alexander III of Russia and by his son, the Tsarevich Nicholas (later Emperor Nicholas II from 1894), supervised the building of the railway between 1891 and 1916. Even before its completion, the line attracted travelers who wrote of their adventures.The Trans-Siberian Railway has directly connected Moscow with Vladivostok since 1916.
As we control the Finnish heartland, we can give them a more autonomous status in our nation.
Our advantageous position allows us to unite the Northern Countries into one single federation.

We must send out our young students to study in foreign, more advanced, technologically-wise, nations for our own benefit. §RThis decision will make you sphered by a random country which is a great power and has atleast 100 relations with you. If you want a specific country to be your spherelord, make sure it is the only one with over 100 relations with you
The Fertile valleys of Muntenia are perfect for facilitating large quantities of food.
The time has come to bury the hatchet.
Picking this will not allow us to confiscate Papal Wealth
Restore the True Glory of Rome: Its Rich Eastern Lands! (You cannot go for the decision 'Dreams of Rome', or it's equivalent if Rome forms, if you go down this path)
Modernizing the dilapidated irrigation systems of the Nile will improve the output of farms across the Nile massively and surely bring a baby boom with it!
Restoring the Patriach to the Eternal City will bring us great Prestige and show the illegitimate Papists that God is on our side.
The Seat of the Patriach of Alexandria has been lost centuries ago. Let us restore this holy site to its rightful faith and cement our victory over the Arab Kingdoms.
The Sack of Mecca and Medina
We have reconquered the Holy City! Our ultimate victory over the Arab Emirates and illegitimate Crusader States is moments away!
Taking this will not allow us to reassert the supremacy of Greek culture.
Reassert the Supremacy of Greek Culture
Taking this will not allow us to create a compromise with the Turkmen population.
The Origin of our peoples is in Rome! We must reconquer our peoples ancient lands! (You cannot go for 'The Glory of the East' decision if you decide to go down this path)
Dominate the Balkan states and establish our glorious rule in these unruly lands.
Restore the Patriach of Antioch to his rightful seat. Soon Christendom will fully return to the Levant and God Willing to the entire Middle East.
Settle the Aegean Coast with Greeks, restoring our historic lands and bringing prosperity to our state.
Various dialects in our country could be taught the correct form of our language to increase efficency.
Times in our nation are not the best, let us pray for international aid.
Let the world know that $COUNRTY_ADJ$ are a generous people.
Our generosity has run its course.
For long the clergy of Jerusalem has held massive influence over the government and it's laws, this was fine during the conquests but we cannot continue this way
Our First Step to Secularization shall be taken now, we shall strip powers from the clergy and hand them over to state offices.
We have stripped away the clergy's offices, now we must completely separate all religious functions from the state.
Take this decision to get rid of any North Italian or South Italian pops that are leftover in colonial states or other non-majority North/South Italian provinces.

Ever since the start of the Second Mongolian Empire, we have kept a presence in China, although not directly. This presence has over time gradually diminished into becoming the rump state of Jijig Yuwan, a shadow of it's former hold over China it serves no purpose to us as being kept seperate from our empire.
Our military has suffered numerous setbacks due to it's dated methods and weapons, we must invest into a reform of the army at the head of our field marshall Eldegai.
After decades of study and theorization, our generals have finished what Eldegai started decades ago and we now have a new modernized army.

After many hundreds of years of control over Yuan, the people have slowly adopted Mongolian customs and a heavily Mongolian influenced language. To the untrained ear and eye, they seem to be one in the same.
Taking this decision will block out the ability to take the "Consolidate our Germanic Holdings" decision
Taking this decision will block out the ability to take the "Expansion in North Italy" decision
After many centuries of decline, our Sultanate is resurgent and is seeking to retake our former lands, starting with the Holy City and Arabia
The Nejd desert is a very import part of Arabian folk lore and Sunni theology, having a host of scholars and thinkers situated in these deserts.

Our ancestors explored much of Asia and the Indian continent before the europeans even set foot around the Cape, but after the crusaders landed in the levant we were stripped of valuable land which allowed us to fund these expeditions. Now after our rebirth we must kickstart our colonization by conquering the Bengal Delta. §RThis decision declares war on Bengal for an establish protectorate cb and gives you 15 infamy

The Italian peninsula has been secured, now we must convene. §RThis event contains 3 options, two of which will give you infamy, one is 15 infamy and the other is 25 infamy, so be careful when clicking this decision
This decision increases the base assimilation chance for Breton pops, although the decision only gives prestige and militancy
It is our god given right to conquer the entire Iberian Peninsula! Soon the Caliphate will rule from the Galician Hillsides to the Deserts of Oman! Inshallah!

Now that we conquered the entire Peninsula and destroyed the Asturian Kings we can claim to be the rightful rulers of Iberia. Let peace and prosperity convince the Asturians to finally accept their new overlords and integrate them into loyal subjects of the Caliphate.
idk what this is supposed to be but let em cook ig
LIKE THE EU4 DLC AND THE SABATON SONG?!?!?!?! OMGGGGG WOWZERS I FARTED ON MY B4LLLSACK
skibidi dob dob dob yes yes, skibidi dob dob dob di di

This will show the decisions for taxation.
§RNote that you can only see the decisions for tax policy that are available for your economic policy.
§BLaissez-faire has the choice between very low and low
§BInterventionism has the choice between low, medium and high
§BState Capitalism has the choice between medium, high
§BPlanned economy is locked to very high.

This will hide the decisions for taxation.
§RNote that you can only see the decisions for tax policy that are available for your economic policy.
§BLaissez-faire has the choice between very low and low
§BInterventionism has the choice between low, medium and high
§BState Capitalism has the choice between medium, high
§BPlanned economy is locked to very high.
This decision will switch you to the Taxation Policy of "Very Low Taxes".
This decision will switch you to the Taxation Policy of "Low Taxes".
This decision will switch you to the Taxation Policy of "Medium Taxes".
This decision will switch you to the Taxation Policy of "High Taxes".
This decision will switch you to the Taxation Policy of "Very High Taxes".
Our country is in dire need of relief as our situation grows worse and worse.
